articles.title: Trump says Iran-Israel ceasefire is in effect after both sides violated it.
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump announced that a "Complete and Total CEASEFIRE" is in effect between Israel and Iran, following a 12-day conflict. The agreement came after both sides reportedly launched missiles, with Iran targeting a U.S. base in Qatar and Israel conducting strikes in Iran. Both nations have publicly agreed to the ceasefire, which was proposed by the U.S.

articles.title: 145 people at France music festival report being pricked with syringes after online calls to target women.
articles.description: During France's annual FÃªte de la Musique, 145 people reported being pricked with syringes. The incidents occurred amidst "unprecedented crowds" and followed social media calls to target women. Authorities have detained 12 suspects, and it is currently unclear if the needles contained any drugs.

articles.title: Supreme Court allows Trump to restart swift deportation of migrants to locations that are not their home countries.
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court has lifted a lower court's order, allowing the Trump administration to resume the rapid deportation of migrants to countries where they have no previous ties. The ruling, which saw the court's three liberal justices dissent, gives officials more flexibility in carrying out mass deportations, particularly when a migrant's home country is resistant to their return.
